projects.title: Vintage Simon Arcade
projects.description: Vintage Simon Arcade is a game that is played with colors being displayed and a player returning the same pattern of colors displayed earlier.

projects.title: Confessions
projects.description: Confessions is a platform where a user share a secret, fantasy, regrets or any other thing that has been a burden on their emotions and interact with other users.

projects.title: Rick and Morty
projects.description: Rick and Morty app is based on the show and API. It is informational about the characters in the show and it was amazing to build it.

projects.title: The Parley Blog
projects.description: The Parley Blog is a website where ideas about subjects are transcribed. It is a space where monographs articulate and discuss their subjects with the reader and receive feedbacks or comments.
